title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Deep dive on Amazon S3 (STG407)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 深入探讨 Amazon S3 (STG407)
abstract: Amazon S3 operates at massive scale, serving hundreds of millions of transactions per second across more than 100 data centers and tens of millions of drives. In this session, we'll explore how S3 achieves 99.99% availability and strong read-after-write consistency while gracefully handling constant failures at every level—from bits to buildings. Join us to learn about the architectural principles and engineering decisions that enable one of the world's largest storage systems to maintain data integrity and availability at scale.
abstract_cn: Amazon S3 以大规模运行，每秒处理数亿次事务，跨越 100 多个数据中心和数千万个驱动器。在本次会议中，我们将探讨 S3 如何实现 99.99% 的可用性和强读后写一致性，同时优雅地处理从位到建筑物各个级别的持续故障。加入我们，了解使全球最大存储系统之一能够大规模维护数据完整性和可用性的架构原则和工程决策。
